fields.name: agreement
fields.label: Authorizations
fields.placeholder:
1. All applicants are required to complete an "Application to Rent." As part of the tenant screening process you authorize the Rowley Family LLC dba AJJ Property Management to obtain a current credit report, criminal background check, conduct background checks and other information necessary to verify all information on this application. 

 2. By signing and submitting this application you expressly consent to use of electronic records for this transaction and will never withdraw your consent for use of electronic records. Please read this Federal ESIGN Disclosure and Consent carefully and keep a copy for your records. The following disclosures are required by the federal Electronic Signatures in Global and National Commerce Act (“ESIGN”). They are necessary to submit your application electronically; you can record your consent to the ESIGN disclosures by signing below. By signing below, you are consenting to receive the following disclosures, notices, terms and conditions, and other documents and all changes to the disclosures, notices, etc. electronically. In order to submit and electronic application and to access, receive and retain the disclosures, notices, etc. you must provide at your own expense an Internet connected device that is compatible with rental application deployed at the time of access. Your device must meet the minimum requirements outlined below. You also confirm that your device will meet these specifications and requirements and will permit you to access and retain the disclosures and notices electronically each time you access and use the rental application. You can also contact us in any of the ways described in the preceding paragraph to withdraw your consent to receive any future disclosures, notices, terms and conditions, and other documents electronically. If you withdraw your consent, we will cease reviewing your application. Consent by signing below, you consent to the electronic delivery of the disclosures, notices, terms and conditions, other documents, and any future changes. You also agree that the Rowley Family LLC does not need to provide you with an additional paper (non-electronic) copy of the disclosures, notices, terms and conditions, and other documents, and any future changes, unless specifically requested. 

 3. I declare that the information given on this application to be true under penalty of perjury under the laws of the State of Washington submitted in the City of Spokane, Spokane County, State of Washington.
